```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Chargement des packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(survival)
```

Importation des données 
```{r}
teletravail <- read_dta("Teletravail.dta")
```

```{r}
teletravail <- teletravail %>% 
  mutate(male = factor(male), y39 = factor(y39), y45 = factor(y45), y51 = factor(y51), 
         ch1 = factor(ch1), tele = factor(tele), fulltime = factor(fulltime), 
         const = factor(const), choice = factor(choice)) %>% 
  select(-c(female, ch3, notele, partime)) %>% 
  filter(choice %in% c(0, 1)) %>%
  droplevels()
```

Statistique descriptive
```{r}
summary(teletravail)
```

```{r}
teletravail %>% 
  filter(personid == 1)
```

Modèle logit conditionnel
```{r}
mod_cond <- clogit(choice ~ male + tele + fulltime + ch1 + y39 + y45 + y51 + const + 
                   strata(obsid), data = teletravail)
summary(mod_cond)
```
